sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Default">c4895cc9836e5210cccd5d10feaad3fd</macroponent><name>textarea_1/value</name><preset/><required_translations>[]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
  * @param {params} params
  * @param {api} params.api
  * @param {TransformApiHelpers} params.helpers
  */
function evaluateProperty({api, helpers}) {

     var query = "";

    Object.entries(api.state.Selected_State).forEach(([key, value]) => {
            if (value.active === false) {
                query += `^state=${value.value}`;
            }
                
            
        });
    
    if (query.startsWith("^")) {
        query = query.substring(1);
    }
    if (query.endsWith("^")) {
        query = query.slice(0, -1);
    }


    
    return query;

}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-12-17 12:09:30</sys_created_on><sys_id>0f3529d1832ad210cccd5d10feaad361</sys_id><sys_mod_count>15</sys_mod_count><sys_name>textarea_1/value</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Automotive Service Management" source="x_1522458_automo_0">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Automotive Service Management">22ad9dee83861210cccd5d10feaad392</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_0f3529d1832ad210cccd5d10feaad361</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-12-17 14:02:51</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>transform</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
